guests.Name: PrinceWhateverer
guests.Desc:
Heyo! I'm Prince!

MLP themed rock & metal musician since 2011 with no plans to stop... Ever!
If you like high-energy rock tunes then I'm your guy! >:D 

See you in the pit! \,,/,

guests.Name: Faulty
guests.Desc: The Self proclaimed King of Progressive House in the current day Pony Fandom will be bringing you nothing but the best music of the Pony EDM scene!

guests.Name: RiffPonies
guests.Desc: Wherein some of the best in the Brony fandom converge and make fun of bad pony cartoons!

guests.Name: Sleepypony
guests.Desc: Resident old git that runs online radio stations and does audio/video, AR and VR education. I'm also that teacher you always wanted in school.
